comment: Characterization of the substitutions as functions from expressions to expressions that distribute under concatenation and map constants to themselves. (The constant part uses ` ( C \ V ) ` because we don't know that ` C ` and ` V ` are disjoint until we get to ~ ismfs .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
